special_text:
Lands enter tapped.
[+1]: Up to one target creature you control explores. That creature must be blocked this turn if able.
[-2]: Ajani deals 3 damage to target permanent. You gain 3 life. If excess damage is dealt this way, create a Map token. [i](It's an artifact with “{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Target creature you control explores. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]
